description:
What a girl dreams in a violent storm…
Kaori is a shy girl who is secretly in love with Senpai. She happens to see an advertisement about Secret Dreams - a place where people can experience a virtual dream. Making up her mind, she goes to try it out. Once she’s registered, she is led to a capsule, where she is told to strip naked and put on a sensory suit with devices attached to her body.
The virtual dream begins, and she finds herself alone with her true love, Senpai. She’s happy, but then things begin to get perverted.
title: Dream Hazard
